title: Band Of Mothers w/ Danielle Schneider
description:
This week June is out this week, but friend of the pod, Danielle Schneider (Bitch Sesh), joins Jessica to help co-pilot this week's dive and they dig RIGHT IN! They discuss their friendship, parenting, how they 'mother' each other, and exchange wild animal encounters. Then, Danielle shares how she stays a resilient person, pushes past her fears, and sees the light within the dark. Deep Divers, keep tabs on who your ‘emergency exit’ is.

You can follow The Deep Dive on Twitter @thedeepdivepod

Follow our Pinterest board pinterest.com/thedeepdive

June Diane Raphael @MsJuneDiane on Twitter @junediane on Instagram

Jessica St. Clair @Jessica_StClair on Twitter @stclairjessica on Instagram

Check out the Jane Club at www.janeclub.com

Send us your The Deep Dive theme or any questions you might have to thedeepdive@earwolf.com
author: thedeepdive@earwolf.com (Earwolf & Jessica St. Clair, June Diane Rapheal)
